attributes.background:
Hasmo is a rubbish school with rubbish teachers but every student has the right to learn and every teacher has a right to teach (but they cant!)
so i think that Hasmonean High School should be closed down the people can actually learn in another real school.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to complain about a school or academy here:
